body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Native of Prussia. Married to Harriet Bijur. Father of Bertha Bijur, William F. Bijur, and Anna Bell Bijur. Practiced in partnership with Byron Bacon and later with Peter B. Muir. Elected on Republican ticket as member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1865.
